slide1.title: Launch Your App in Days!
slide1.description: This boilerplate saves you weeks of setup time so you can focus on what makes your app special

slide2.title: No Coding Experience Needed
slide2.description: Pre-built screens and components make it easy to customize your app even if you're just getting started

slide3.title: All Features Ready to Use
slide3.description: Login, dark mode, notifications, payments and more - everything works out of the box

slide4.title: Get to the App Store Fast
slide4.description: Follow our simple guides to customize, build and publish your app in record time
